text: vahee vah (khudae qaadir) hai jisane aafataab ko chamakadaar aur mahataab ko raushan banaaya aur usakee manzilen muqarrar kee taaki tum log barason kee ginatee aur hisaab maaloom karo khuda ne use hikamat va masalahat se banaaya hai vah (apanee) aayaton ka vaaqifakaar logon ke lie tafaseeladaar bayaan karata hai
